text: This move today was a reminder of that fact. Whilst she automatically patted the hand of the agitated Lucia, her brain was working rapidly, and she decided that she must be prepared to counter Orsini's demands, difficult though that would be. She became aware that the pace was slackening; now the coach stopped.
